From: "Anne O" <topaaz1@...>

yep yep i use bind wound and so does my druid....when i am oom and the only
healer...it can mean the diff between someones life or death
but i did not use it at lower lvls.......
Topaaz SpellBinder
Preistess.....Xegony

>From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] bind wounds (was: avoiding heal/taunt)

>
>
>I don't use it. I know a lot tanks that do, though.
>
>From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
>Just a question... does anyone but me use Bind wounds?
>
>Mines around 100ish and I do 25ish a Bind Im told. But I almost never hear
>of anyone, other clerics included, who bother with it. If not, why not?
>
>Shannyn
>
